t: Register new agents in config and references
mh: All 3 new roles resolve in model-profiles.json
All 3 new roles appear in company-hierarchy.md
resolve-agent-model.sh handles po, questionary, roadmap roles
obj: Add the PO, Questionary, and Roadmap roles to all shared configuration and reference files: model-profiles.json, company-hierarchy.md, and resolve-agent-model.sh. Consolidates all shared file updates to avoid parallel merge conflicts.

a: Add 3 new roles to config/model-profiles.json. For each of the three profiles add: quality: po=opus, questionary=sonnet, roadmap=sonnet; balanced: po=opus, questionary=sonnet, roadmap=sonnet; budget: po=sonnet, questionary=haiku, roadmap=haiku. PO gets opus in quality/balanced (strategic reasoning), sonnet in budget. Questionary and Roadmap get sonnet in quality/balanced (dialogue/planning focused), haiku in budget.
v: jq '.quality.po, .balanced.po, .budget.po' config/model-profiles.json returns opus, opus, sonnet; jq '.quality.questionary' returns sonnet; jq '.quality.roadmap' returns sonnet

a: Add all 3 new roles to references/company-hierarchy.md: (1) Agent Roster table — 3 new rows: yolo-po (Product Owner / Vision & Scope | Opus | Read,Glob,Grep,Write | scope-document.json, user_presentation | 3000), yolo-questionary (Scope Clarification / Requirements Analyst | Sonnet | Read,Glob,Grep | scope_clarification JSON | 2000), yolo-roadmap (Dependency & Roadmap Planner | Sonnet | Read,Glob,Grep,Write | roadmap_plan JSON | 2000); (2) Planning Team section — add PO, Questionary, Roadmap after Analyze: Analyze->PO->Questionary->Roadmap->Critic->Scout->Architect->Lead; (3) Data Flow — add PO layer: Analyze(analysis.json)->PO(scope-document.json)->Critic->Scout->Architect->Lead; (4) Decision Authority Matrix — 3 new rows per agent's CAN/MUST Escalate rules; (5) Command Routing Table — update /yolo:go (execute) row to include PO step.
v: grep -c 'yolo-po' references/company-hierarchy.md returns >= 3; grep -c 'yolo-questionary' references/company-hierarchy.md returns >= 2; grep -c 'yolo-roadmap' references/company-hierarchy.md returns >= 2

a: Add po, questionary, and roadmap roles to scripts/resolve-agent-model.sh case statement. Add all three to the known roles list alongside existing roles (analyze, critic, architect, lead, senior, tester, dev, qa, qa-code, security, scout, debugger, owner, and their fe-/ux- variants).
v: bash scripts/resolve-agent-model.sh po .yolo-planning/config.json config/model-profiles.json exits 0; same for questionary and roadmap roles
